title: Coding Quiz App
shortDescription: A Quiz App that allows you to tailor the quiz to your style.
description: A Quiz App that allows you to choose your preferred programming language, and tailor the quiz to your style with options for time limits and question count.

title: SubReddit
shortDescription: A Reddit client that displays multiple subreddits in separate lanes.
description: A browser-based Reddit client that displays multiple subreddits in separate, customizable lanes.

title: Personal Portfolio
shortDescription: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills. It includes sections for my work experience, education, and contact information.

title: AI Chef
shortDescription: Claude Chef uses powerful AI models to suggest recipes.
description: Claude Chef is a web application that uses Hugging Face's powerful AI models to suggest recipes based on the ingredients you have. Simply input a list of ingredients, and the app will provide a creative, markdown-formatted recipe tailored to your pantry.

title: Unit Converter
shortDescription: An app that can convert between different units of measurement.
description: A simple web app that can convert between different units of measurement. It can convert units of length, weight, volume, area, temperature, and more.
